strapiPost.title: Crawfish Boils This Weekend
strapiPost.content:
It’s crawfish boil season, and there are a couple happening in NWA this weekend! 

  • Fayetteville: Friends of the Yvonne Richardson Community Center are hosting an all-you-can-eat crawfish boil with ice cream this Friday. The meal will cost $10, but attendees can donate more to the community center’s Adopt-A-Kid fundraiser as well.
  • Rogers: The 9th Annual Downtown Rogers Crawfish Boil is this Saturday. Tickets are $40 for all-you-can-eat crawfish n’ fixings and a community experience with live music, raffle games, and beer & cocktails for purchase. This year’s event is benefitting the Rogers Public Education Foundation.

Click on the respective crawfish boils for more information.
